title: Will Skill Rating be exposed to the PvP API?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: rating and decay in /v2/pvp/standings are what you’re looking for. Only have the current values — I don’t think we’re currently tracking season best.

comments.author: Honest John.4673
comments.body: Good to know, thanks for the quick response!

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
I’m hoping to have both the skill rating and maybe leaderboards up on the API by Dec 13.

I’ll try to put together a PR on Github later today for preview/review.

comments.author: Honest John.4673
comments.body: Like your Division/Pips in seasons past, will skill rating make it in? I don’t see any reason why it shouldn’t.
